Title: Celebrate the victorious opening of the Fourth Session of the National People's Congress with the brilliant results of grasping revolution and promoting production
Designer: Shanghai Art Design Company (上海美术设计公司)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: The 4th National People's Congress was in session from 1975 to 1978. It held only one session, in January 1975. The Congress passed the 1975 Constitution of the PRC. The posts of President and Vice President were abolished according to the suggestion of Mao Zedong.This poster consists of 2 parts.
